Sets of coefficients to minimize the absolute errors of
the following approximation to erfc(x):
     q(x) = exp(-x**2) * t(x) * P_N(t(x)),
where
     t(x) = 1 / (1 + p * x),
     P_N(X) = a_00 + a_01 * X + ... + a_N * X ** N,
     x \in [0, \infty).

Reference:
C. Hastings, Jr., Approximations for Digital Computers,
Princeton University Press, Princeton (1955).

--------------
N = 1
 a_00 =  0.245867841245010782430445131378406908
 a_01 =  0.754132158754989217569554868621593092
 p    =  0.647466264752152904734717750597000174
max_abs_err = 0.00033365796415906
--------------

 p    =  0.470497019044191143649114716842683283
